section.title: Getting the agent version (version)
section.para: The Jolokia command version returns the version of the Jolokia agent along with the protocol version.

section.title: GET version request
section.para: The GET URL for a version request has the following format:
For GET request the version part can be omitted since this is the default command if no command is provided as path info.

section.title: POST version request
section.para: A version POST request has only a single key type which has to be set to version.

section.title: Version response
section.para: The response value for a version request looks like:

protocol in the response value contains the protocol version used, agent is the version of the Jolokia agent. See for the various protocol versions and the interoperability. If the agent is able to detect the server, additional meta information about this server is returned (i.e. the product name, the vendor and optionally some extra information added by the server detector).
